urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Flights to Thailand & More | THAI

data.text: @MONISH77023009 Greetings. We suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons and send us via DM instead so we can keep you posted. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

@jeetqwerty Greetings. Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to your agency. Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Thank you.
@helrose_ We do apologize for the long handling time at our refund department.  Please be assured that we will contact you as quickly as possible. Our apologies in advance.

data.text: @radheshagarwal Greetings, we suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons and send us via DM instead so we can keep you posted. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
@helrose_ Greetings, we are sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.

@pramadithya Greetings, due to the high pressure on our customer service, our processing time is longer than normal. Our colleagues will proceed with your request as soon as they can. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

@elbfeuereins We would like to suggest that you contact our Thai Airways office in your city of departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@elbfeuereins Hello, the booking that is made by the travel agency, passengers have to contact the travel agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system. The agency will further coordinate with the airlines for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.
@ronyarpsj If we have any updates, we will announce that as soon as possible.

@ronyarpsj Hi, THAI is undergoing rehabilitation through the Central Bankruptcy Court and therefore is temporarily unable to provide a refund on those tickets. Further information on the refund process and the Company’s rehabilitation will be provided soon.

@Arijit_Sarkar27 Greetings. THAI is undergoing rehabilitation through the Central Bankruptcy Court and therefore is temporarily unable to provide a refund on those tickets. Further information on the refund process, the Company’s rehabilitation will be provided soon.
@Kamran09548059 Hello, If we have any updates about our operation, we will announce that as soon as possible.
@chitwanarora6 Greetings. We would like to advise you to delete this tweet as it contains your personal information. We will reply to you via Direct Message.
@wurstwaschtl If we have any updates, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.

@aayushchamp THAI is undergoing rehabilitation through the Central Bankruptcy Court and therefore is temporarily unable to provide a refund on those tickets. Further information on the refund process and the Company’s rehabilitation will be provided soon.
@yang_yang1210 Thank you for your kindness.
@yang_yang1210  We invite you to please send us a private message with your booking reference so we can better advise.
@LebbyE  We invite you to please send us a private message with your booking reference so we can better advise.
@Stefan_baisden Sorry, we could not specify the time at the moment.

@Stefan_baisden THAI is undergoing rehabilitation through the Central Bankruptcy Court and therefore is temporarily unable to provide a refund on those tickets. Further information on the refund process and the Company’s rehabilitation will be provided soon.
@fiatclassic69 Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any further questions.

@fiatclassic69 We regret to inform you that you will be able to get a refund for the travel voucher after it expired. You may contact our THAI office in your departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR.
@fiatclassic69 @ThaiAirways You may visit https://t.co/LKK1lKSpj2 for more information. https://t.co/7kOBfg4QsS
@fiatclassic69 Greetings, the travel voucher can be refunded if not used at the end of its expiry date.
@mn_utami We suggest that you contact our THAI office via e-mail. Our officers will reply to you as soon as possible.
@friiyayy Passengers have to contact the travel agency to make any alterations to their ticket. You may send an e-mail to contact@service.thaiairways.com for more information on terms and conditions.
@Rodo2_15 Greetings, please wait for the official announcement about flight resume and keep abreast of all related news.
@paulio81s Greetings, could you please Direct Message to us? We will reply to you via Direct Message.
@andrianikeke We will send you a message.
@andrianikeke Greetings, could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.
@_LauraOakes Greetings, could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.

@JoeyBoy_78 In this case, please contact our Royal Orchid Plus at the number +662-356-1111 and press 93 for English (at 08.10 -17.00 Mon - Fri) assistance or sending an email to ropsvc@thaiairways.com for further assistance.

@mn_utami that the processing time of debit card payments may take longer than that of credit cards depending on process of the bank that had issued the debit card you used THAI may refuse refund application making later than 90 days after the expiry of e-Tickets for refundable e-Tickets.

@mn_utami Refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket and additional fees may be applied. Please be aware
@africanfreckles Take care, stay safe, and we’ll see you on board again very soon.

data.text: @Hborneo2 We suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons and send us via inbox instead so we can keep you posted. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
@CharlotteWardy Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact from our staff again. We apologize for the inconvenience.
@SuperGeir77 We apologize for the inconvenience. Due to the large number of people who contact us, the process must take some time.
@mn_utami Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@friiyayy We suggest that you contact your agency for assistance.
@elbfeuereins Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@friiyayy In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket.
@SuperGeir77 Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact from our staff again. We apologize for the inconvenience.
@friiyayy Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@SuperGeir77 Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@alyssa32113086 Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact from our staff again. We apologize for the inconvenience.
@EllyViner We already followed you. Could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.
@EllyViner Greetings, could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message?
@Flutesteve May we send a message to you via DM?
@Flutesteve Could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.
@ArchitaBhuyan3 Greetings. We will reply to you via Direct Message for your inquiry.

@Flutesteve Hello, it will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket. If you booked tickets through travel agencies, please contact the agents for assistance. If you booked directly through Thai Airways, you may contact 02-356-1111 (24 hrs) or https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR.
@STKAM Due to the high volume of incoming requests. If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.

@JoeyBillins Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you. Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Thank you.
@JoeyBillins Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@py6u As we are a social media team, we cannot specify the time of each replying issue via email. However, if there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.
@oliviaanewmann You are most welcome.

@oliviaanewmann We would like to inform you that as our social media team we do not have authorized to access the information. Please send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com for further assistance.

@alyssa32113086 Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you. Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Thank you.
@Lola_Dprt Greetings, we would like to inform that THAI has suspended operations for one more month in June 2020. If there any updates, we will announce it as soon as possible.
@alyssa32113086 If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.

@oliviaanewmann Greetings, we understand that you've already submitted your refund request. We seek your patience as our colleagues work to process a large number of requests and queries received during this time. Thank you.
@normberetta We would like to inform that THAI has suspended operations for one more month in June 2020. If there any updates, we will announce it as soon as possible.
@normberetta Greetings, may we inquire what you may be concerned about?
@alyssa32113086 We suggest that you contact the number (44 207) 907 9518, (44 207) 907 9520​, 44 (0) 330 400 4022 or email reservations@thaiairways.co.uk
@alyssa32113086 We are sorry for the inconvenience. We would like to suggest that you contact our Thai Airways office in your city of departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR.
@trentasaurus83 We already sent you a direct message.
@trentasaurus83 Could you please provide us your booking number and last name via Direct Message?
@robeenobambeeno Our officer will get back to you soon.
@brigittajulia Greetings, the ticket which has been extended is still valid. If we resume our operation, you can contact our THAI office to rebook a flight.
@BabbarEr Greetings, please wait for the official announcement about the flight resume. However, in the case of stranded travelers, we suggest that you contact the Embassy for further assistance.
